addComputePeers(bytes32,(bytes32,address.details: Add compute peers to an offer

addComputeUnits(bytes32,bytes32[]).details: Add compute units to a peer

changeMinPricePerCuPerEpoch(bytes32,uint.details: Change the min price per CU per epoch of an offer

getComputeUnitIds(bytes32).details: Returns the compute unit ids of a peer

getComputeUnits(bytes32).details: Returns the compute units info of a peer

params.minPricePerCuPerEpoch: The min price per CU per epoch which the provider specify for the matching with the deal
params.paymentToken: The payment token of the offer
params.peers: The compute peers of the offer

removeEffectorInfo((bytes4,bytes32)).details: Remove the effector info. Effector info can be removed by the contract owner

setEffectorInfo((bytes4,bytes32),string,.details: Set the effector info. Effector info can be added by the contract owner

devdoc.details: Offer contract is responsible for managing the offers in the market

addComputePeers(bytes32,(bytes32,address.details: Add compute peers to an offer

addComputeUnits(bytes32,bytes32[]).details: Add compute units to a peer

changeMinPricePerCuPerEpoch(bytes32,uint.details: Change the min price per CU per epoch of an offer

getComputeUnitIds(bytes32).details: Returns the compute unit ids of a peer

getComputeUnits(bytes32).details: Returns the compute units info of a peer

params.minPricePerCuPerEpoch: The min price per CU per epoch which the provider specify for the matching with the deal
params.paymentToken: The payment token of the offer
params.peers: The compute peers of the offer

removeEffectorInfo((bytes4,bytes32)).details: Remove the effector info. Effector info can be removed by the contract owner

setEffectorInfo((bytes4,bytes32),string,.details: Set the effector info. Effector info can be added by the contract owner

ComputeUnitCreated(bytes32,bytes32).details: Emitted when a compute unit created for a peer

ComputeUnitRemoved(bytes32,bytes32).details: Emitted when a compute unit removed from a peer

EffectorAdded(bytes32,(bytes4,bytes32)).details: Emitted when an effector added to an offer

EffectorInfoRemoved((bytes4,bytes32)).details: Emitted when the effector info is removed

EffectorInfoSet((bytes4,bytes32),string,.details: Emitted when the effector info is set. Effector info can be added by the contract owner

EffectorRemoved(bytes32,(bytes4,bytes32).details: Emitted when an effector removed from an offer

MarketOfferRegistered(address,bytes32,ui.details: Emitted when a new offer is registered

params.minPricePerCuPerEpoch: The min price per cu per epoch which the provider specify for the matching with the deal
params.paymentToken: The payment token of the offer

MinPricePerCuPerEpochUpdated(bytes32,uin.details: Emitted when the min price per worker per epoch of an offer is updated

params.minPricePerCuPerEpoch: The new min price per worker per epoch

PaymentTokenUpdated(bytes32,address).details: Emitted when the payment token of an offer is updated

PeerCreated(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Emitted when a peer created for an offer

PeerRemoved(bytes32,bytes32).details: Emitted when a peer removed from an offer

ProtocolVersionUpgraded(bytes32,uint256,.details: Emitted when protocol version of an offer is updated

params.maxProtocolVersion: The new maximum supported protocol version
params.minProtocolVersion: The new minimum supported protocol version

ProviderInfoUpdated(address,string,(byte.details: Emitted when a provider info is updated

params.metadata: The new metadata of the provider
params.name: The new name of the provider

devdoc.title: Offer contract interface

documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when the effector info is removed
 @param id The effector cid

@dev Returns the effector info
 @param id The effector cid
@dev Add compute peers to an offer
@dev Add compute units to a peer
@dev Change the min price per CU per epoch of an offer
@dev Set the effector info. Effector info can be added by the contract owner
@dev Remove the effector info. Effector info can be removed by the contract owner

@title Offer contract interface
 @dev Offer contract is responsible for managing the offers in the market
